text: (maṟṟuḷḷavaruṭe) vivāhabandhattilirikkunna strīkaḷuṁ (niṅṅaḷkk niṣid'dhamākkappeṭṭirikkunnu.) niṅṅaḷuṭe kaikaḷ uṭamappeṭuttiyavar (aṭimastrīkaḷ) oḻike. niṅṅaḷuṭe mēl allāhuvinṟe niyamamatre it‌. atinnappuṟamuḷḷa strīkaḷumāyi niṅṅaḷuṭe dhanaṁ (mah‌ṟāyi) nalkikkeāṇṭ niṅṅaḷ (vivāhabandhaṁ) tēṭunnat niṅṅaḷkk anuvadikkappeṭṭirikkunnu. niṅṅaḷ vaivāhika jīvitaṁ lakṣyamākkunnavarāyirikkaṇaṁ. nīcavr̥tti āgrahikkunnavarākarut‌. aṅṅane avaril ninn niṅṅaḷ valla sukhavumanubhaviccāl avarkkuḷḷa vivāhamūlyaṁ oru bādhyata enna nilayil niṅṅaḷ nalkēṇṭatāṇ‌. bādhyata (vivāhamūlyaṁ) niścayiccatinu śēṣaṁ niṅṅaḷ an'yēān'yaṁ tr̥ptippeṭṭ valla viṭṭuvīḻcayuṁ ceyyunnatil niṅṅaḷkk kuṟṟameānnumilla. tīrccayāyuṁ allāhu ellāṁ aṟiyunnavanuṁ yuktimānumākunnu
